gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT]: Meteoblue suggests a possibility of light rain differing from the baseline's dry forecast. Meteoblue: 0.1-0.2" of rain expected. Looks like a good day to stay indoors, unless you're a duck who enjoys a little drizzle.
